top_stories.title: French and Malaysian authorities are investigating Grok for generating sexualized deepfakes
top_stories.description: France and Malaysia have joined India in condemning Grok for creating sexualized deepfakes of women and minors.
top_stories.author: Anthony Ha
top_stories.content: France and Malaysia have joined India in condemning Grok for creating sexualized deepfakes of women and minors.

top_stories.title: Marine Biological Laboratory Explores Human Memory With AI and Virtual Reality
top_stories.description: The works of Plato state that when humans have an experience, some level of change occurs in their brain, which is powered by memory — specifically long-term memory. This change is what Andre Fenton, professor of neural science at New York University, and Abhishek Kumar, assistant professor of cell and regenerative biology at the University Read Article

top_stories.title: Advancing ADHD diagnosis: How Qbtech built a mobile AI assessment Model Using Amazon SageMaker AI
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore how Qbtech streamlined their machine learning (ML) workflow using Amazon SageMaker AI, a fully managed service to build, train and deploy ML models, and AWS Glue, a serverless service that makes data integration simpler, faster, and more cost effective. This new solution reduced their feature engineering time from weeks to hours, while maintaining the high clinical standards required by healthcare providers.
top_stories.author: Antonio Martellotta
top_stories.content: In this post, we explore how Qbtech streamlined their machine learning (ML) workflow using Amazon SageMaker AI, a fully managed service to build, train and deploy ML models, and AWS Glue, a serverless service that makes data integration simpler, faster, and more cost effective. This new solution reduced their feature engineering time from weeks to hours, while maintaining the high clinical standards required by healthcare providers.

top_stories.title: AI agent-driven browser automation for enterprise workflow management
top_stories.description: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. Despite significant technology investments, knowledge workers routinely navigate between eight to twelve different web applications during standard workflows, constantly switching contexts and manually transferring information between systems. Data entry and validation tasks […]

top_stories.title: Semperis Named Security Partner of the Year in Cohesity FY2025 Partner Awards
top_stories.description: Semperis, a provider of AI-powered identity security and cyber resilience, has been named by Cohesity, the leader in AI-powered data security, as its Security Partner of the Year in the FY2025 Cohesity Partner Awards. The annual awards celebrate partners who demonstrate exceptional commitment to helping organizations strengthen cyber resilience, accelerate recovery, and...
